mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dev_company WHERE company_email=#{companyEmail} AND company_password=PASSWORD(#{companyPw})
mapper.update: UPDATE dev_company SET company_password=PASSWORD(#{companyPw}), company_kor_name=#{companyKorName}, company_eng_name=#{companyEngName}, company_type = #{companyType}, company_address = #{companyAddress}, company_phone =#{companyPhone}, company_license=#{companyLicense}, company_link =#{companyLink}, company_ceo =#{companyCEO} , company_sales =#{companySales}, company_employees =#{companyEmployees}, company_about=#{companyAbout}, company_foundation =#{companyFoundation} WHERE company_email=#{companyEmail}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dev_company WHERE (company_kor_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))OR(company_eng_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))

SELECT company_email AS companyEmail, company_kor_name AS companyKorName, company_eng_name AS companyEngName, company_address AS companyAddress, company_phone AS companyPhone FROM dev_company WHERE (company_kor_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))OR(company_eng_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')) ORDER BY company_date desc LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT company_email AS companyEmail, company_kor_name AS companyKorName, company_eng_name AS companyEngName, company_type AS companyType, company_address AS companyAddress, company_phone AS companyPhone, company_license AS companyLicense, company_link AS companyLink, company_ceo AS companyCEO , company_sales AS companySales, company_employees AS companyEmployees, company_about AS companyAbout, company_foundation AS companyFoundation FROM dev_company WHERE company_email=#{companyEmail}
mapper.insert: insert into dev_company ( company_email, company_password,company_kor_name,company_eng_name,company_address, company_phone,company_date) values( #{companyEmail}, PASSWORD(#{companyPw}), #{companyKorName}, #{companyEngName}, #{companyAddress}, #{companyPhone}, NOW() )
